abstract: Taiwan's renowned modern dance troupe Cloud Gate Dance Theater will open Brooklyn Academy of Music’s Next Wave Festival with US premiere of dance piece Rice; troupe, founded by Lin Hwai-Min in 1973 as Taiwan’s first professional dance company, fosters advancement of dance in Taiwan and promotes country’s culture and history internationally.
lead_paragraph: The island’s first professional dance company, founded in 1973, will open the Next Wave Festival at the Brooklyn Academy of Music on Wednesday.

headline.main: Cloud Gate Dance Theater: A Roving, Bounding Symbol of Taiwan
headline.print_headline: A Roving, Bounding Symbol of Taiwan

snippet: The island’s first professional dance company, founded in 1973, will open the Next Wave Festival at the Brooklyn Academy of Music on Wednesday.
